title: kandanaik-kaNDadumE
sahitya:
kandanaik-kaNDadumE kAdal koNDEn en cintai sokka mikka santOSamum koNDEn


anupallavi

  enda nEramum sundara svarUpanin mandahAsa sirippen manattaip-parikkudE


caraNam    inda vidham tAnurum ellaiyillA inbam santatam nilaittiDum sandEham Edum illai
mundaip-piravi tani; mUNDa uravidanai kandan avan maravAmal endaniDam varuvAn
